modName: A key repeater for R and E - DELETED
summary: This is a little C++ code I've cooked up a couple years ago.
descriptionHtml:
This is 2 C++ programs packaged into a single file. Code Included.

I believe you need to setup MinGW in order to even run the code. C++ is notorious for not being portable.

Update: I moved the "How to edit" stuff into the source code. That way it is where it needs to be.

Where this might be useful to you:
When doing alchemy, if you often look to burn all of your ingredients into the most valuable potion, the R repeater will help you with that.
When Crafting with the cooking pot, smelter, forge/anvil or tanning rack, the E repeater will help you there.
The E repeater will also help with containers for depositing items and for trading with followers or the dremora buttler.

Hope this helps.
author: hugojmaia
